long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: form memory automatically saves your input for forms as you type and restores it once the page is reloaded. This is useful when a tab is accidentally closed, chrome crashes, or a particular site or form doesn't offer saving progress before submitting. The source is available at https://github.com/quillford/formmemory.
